attributes.action: Introduce compulsory fitting of Speed Limiters to all motor vehicles!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The advantages will be;
(i)Less collisions. (ii) Fewer traffic jams on motorways. (iii) No need for speed cameras. (iv) Lower emissions. (v) Save fuel.
All of the above will save a tremendous amount of money and will make driving less stressful!
I can think of no downside to this proposal other than initial cost of installation. Compensation for this will be the on-going savings on fuel!
For those who will say that overtaking might be dangerous, I will refer them to the drivers of Heavy Goods vehicles who drive with limiters fitted.
